sentences.en: Against a head wind you made very little headway.
He is not disappointed at the failure to make headway towards resolving their differences.
sentences.cn: 他们之间的分歧依然未能解决，他对此并不感到沮丧。

sentences.en: Headway Academy is a foreign company formed in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 本公司是一家成立于上海的美资公司.

sentences.en: It is doubtful if dehydrated fruit will make much headway.
sentences.cn: 脱水水果是否有多大进步尚难予料.

sentences.en: Magnesium Die Casting have made significant headway in worldwide.
sentences.cn: 镁合金压铸在世界范围内已经取得了重大的进展.

sentences.en: Researchers have made headway toward molecule - size transistors and wires.
sentences.cn: 研究者们已经在研制分子大小的晶体管和线路方面取得了突破.

sentences.en: She has made remarkable headway in her writing skills.
sentences.cn: 她在写作技巧方面有了长足进步.

sentences.en: Significant headway has been made in the large - scale development of China's western region.
sentences.cn: 西部大开发取得重要进展.

sentences.en: Stormy weather stopped the ship from making headway.
sentences.cn: 船在暴风雨天气里不能向前开。

sentences.en: The buses on this line are running on a three - minute headway.
sentences.cn: 这条线路的公共汽车每三分钟开出一辆.

sentences.en: The collective economy in urban and rural areas made new headway.
sentences.cn: 城乡集体经济得到新的发展.

sentences.en: The headway ran almost out, and he drew up slowly toward the sidewalk.
sentences.cn: 船几乎停稳了, 然后他又慢慢地向人行道靠过来.

sentences.en: The large boat was making quick headway.
The ship made little headway in the storm.
sentences.cn: 航船在暴风骤雨中几乎无法前进.

sentences.en: There was concern in the city that police were making little headway in the investigation.
sentences.cn: 警方在调查中未能取得什么进展，对此市民有些担心。

sentences.en: We could make no headway in the huge crowd.
sentences.cn: 我们在一大堆人群里寸步难行.

sentences.en: You'll soon find that when you follow through with these steps one by one, you make serious headway and before you know it, you've achieved your success.
sentences.cn: 很快的你就会发现，一旦你一步一步的按着这些步骤做，在你发现你自己有进步之前你就已经进步了很多，你就已经取得了成功。

trans.tran_cn: 前进，进展，航行速度，间隔时间
trans.tran_en: to make progress towards achieving something – used especially when this is difficult
